resume.name: THANH IM

responsibilities: Performed data validation and cleaning on large health insurance datasets using SQL to ensure accuracy for quarterly financial reporting.
Assisted in the development of automated valuation tools in R, reducing report generation time by 15% for the consulting team.
Participated in sensitivity testing for pension plan assumptions, documenting results for senior actuarial review.
Update and maintain pricing models for personal lines of insurance, incorporating new loss trend data and regulatory requirements.
Collaborate with the product management team to analyze competitive market positions and recommend rate adjustments.
Utilize Python to build predictive models for customer retention, contributing to a 5% improvement in targeted marketing efficiency.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
